text: Research Reviews Membership Pricing FAQs About Why TISLP Team Process Contact Us Log in Join Want Continuing Education credit for reading the monthly reviews? The Informed SLP is a registered provider of ASHA CEUs. Read or listen to a review. Take a quiz question. At the end of each month, we’ll report your time in 30-minute increments for ASHA CEUs! View Course Details Purchase CE Credit If I'm already a member, do I need to purchase CE Credit? How many hours can I earn? Does EVERYTHING I read or listen to count for credit? Do I have to read it, or can I listen to the reviews and get credit? Do you cover all topics within the scope of practice of SLPs? Do you have more content in certain topics than others? After I purchase, how long do I have to obtain credit? How do I know which reviews I’ve received credit for? Do you report these hours directly to the ASHA CE registry? How often do you report course data to ASHA? When will this show up on my ASHA CE Registry? What's required for course completion? Do you have anything to count toward ASHA's ethics or supervision requirements? I have a disability and (may) require accommodations in order to complete this course. How do I get help? What are your cancellation and refund policies? What is your complaint policy? What is your conflict of interest policy? Can’t find the answer you are looking for? CONTACT US We make it easy—read (or listen to) a little or a lot, wherever you can squeeze it in between clients! Then all course history and printable certificates are stored on your member dashboard. And if you use the ASHA CE Registry, we report your hours for you. Purchase CE Credit Why TISLP FAQs Team Process Contact Us The Informed SLP LLC © 2023 Privacy and Terms & Conditions of Service Policies. Why do you need my billing address? Our records indicate your billing address is not on file, and we need this for tax purposes. We will not use your address for anything other than tax record keeping. Please email communications@theinformedslp.com if you have any questions.
